June 19 - 21 , 2017

The first big JVM conference in Spain

3 days to share knowledge and experiences, to meet enthusiasts and geeks, and to learn about new technologies.

Barcelona will host this great event next 19th to 21st of June 2017.

The Barcelona Java Users Group is proud of holding this conference in our great city.

As you probably know, Barcelona is a beautiful city with plenty of places to visit and some of the best urban beaches in the world!

Do not miss the opportunity to participate in this event to immerse yourself in 3-days interesting talks on Java, JVM and opensource technologies.


3 days > 4 tracks > 50 speakers > 400 attendees

Location

Cinema Filmax Gran Via 2

Centre Comercial Gran Via 2

Avinguda de la Granvia, 75

08908 L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, Barcelona

-- how to get there --

Call for Papers

Are you an enthusiast and geek? Do yo want to share your knowledge and experiences?

Join as speaker in JBCNConf. The call for papers will be open until 1st of May.

Join as speaker and send your proposal
